meterreadGAggregator.mainSelect: select * from ( select t.dbi_cd_punto||to_char(t.ldall,'YYYYMMDD')||lmari||lprog as lk, t.dbi_cd_punto, to_char(t.ldall,'YYYYMMDD') as dtlet, t.ltipo, t.lmari, t.lprog, g.equnrneu, d.matnr, dec_numeratore(d.matnr,lprog,lmari,ltipo), decode(lmari, 'P', round(t.lline,1), round(t.llet1)) lettura, dec_tipolettura(e.cflg4, t.ldall), e.cflg4, row_number() over (partition by dbi_cd_punto, lmari, lprog order by ldall) ordine from instmgmtg_diint i, dbi_user.ifc_sap_letture_gas_anubis t, instmgmtg_diger g, devinforecg_int d, dbi_user.ifc_sap_anagrcontrgas e where i.legacy = t.dbi_cd_punto and e.cncon in (select cncon from z_pr_in_lavorazione) and i.legacy = g.legacy and g.equnrneu = d.legacy and dbi_cd_punto = e.cncon and t.ldall > to_date(i.eadat, 'YYYYMMDD') ) where ordine = 1 order by dbi_cd_punto, dtlet, lmari, lprog

meterreadGExtractor.mainSelect: select * from meterreadg_ieablu order by legacy
